primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: God acts as the sovereign reality who breaks into the darkness of human atrocity and death, providing a power that raises the dead when human answers fail.

tekstueel_bewijs: The divine light breaks in upon us of its own will
The power that is God’s alone is the power that raised the crucified Christ

object.identificatie: Revelation and Restoration (Glory to His Name)
tekstueel_bewijs: revelation of the God who alone is powerful

zender.identificatie: The Triune God (God of Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob)
tekstueel_bewijs: the revelation of the one true God who is really God

ontvanger.identificatie: The Church / The Grieving (Newtown families, the flock)
tekstueel_bewijs: it is the power poured into the whole church

helper.identificatie: The Holy Spirit / The Bible (as Word)
tekstueel_bewijs: the power poured into you by the Spirit
the darkness that stalks us all
the white flat face of Death
idols are silver and gold, the work of men’s hands
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is not merely bad behavior but the 'bottom of the night'—the massacre of children and the 'Void' of separation from God.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The preacher/actor (Jack) must 'take direction' and 'not act' so that the Word may be heard.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Preacher (Jack Gilpin)
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The secondary program (ministry) is entirely dependent on the primary program (God's action). The preacher is an instrument, not the source.

voorbeelden_god_subject: The divine light breaks in upon us.
voorbeelden_mens_subject: You will continue to take direction.

voorbeelden: We must wait, and that means suffering.
The divine light breaks in... independently of our wishes.
He taught his students that Shakespeare is vast... bigger than all of us.
The God who alone is able to right wrongs.
The power that is able... to raise the dead.

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon focuses on God's unique 'Pouvoir' (Power) in the face of human 'Non-Pouvoir' (Impotence) regarding evil.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: Moves from S2 (Massacre) to ~S2 (Lament/Waiting) to S1 (Resurrection Power), while rejecting ~S1 (Easy human answers/Idols).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: Resolution is found in the Cross—where God is 'pushed out' but exerts resurrection power.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: Extremely high; the sermon refuses to 'move too quickly' from the darkness.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon is radically theocentric. It explicitly critiques anthropocentrism (idolatry) and insists that God is the only actor capable of addressing the 'Void'.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: Taking direction... is the very heart and soul of Christian faith.

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: It’s about God... the Acts of the Apostles is misnamed. It’s about the actions of God.
The white flat face of Death... the Void.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Biblical figures and the ordinand are shown as 'under authority' or 'called', not as heroes to be emulated by their own strength.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: The sermon already provides this: the Centurion is a story about the 'authority of the word of Jesus'.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Relief and awe; moving from fear to trust in an external power.
identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Monergistic undertones; salvation and revelation are gifts, not achievements.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The narrative of the Sandy Hook tragedy is perfectly integrated into the Advent theology of darkness and God's sovereign light.
spanning_punten: The silence of God ('Where was God?') vs. the action of God in Resurrection.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: The power that is God’s alone is the power that raised the crucified Christ from the tomb.

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The Spirit pours 'Pouvoir' (power) into the incompetent subject.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Absolute; sin is linked to 'The Void' and 'Death'.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon successfully maintains God as the Subject of the primary narrative, relegating human effort to a secondary response of 'taking direction'.

modale_balans.voorgestelde_balans: Maintain as is; appropriate for a funeral/tragedy context.

narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.voorgestelde_structuur: Soteriology (God's act) correctly precedes and enables Ethics (Jack's ministry).

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in theocentric preaching that refuses to let human agency eclipse the 'vast, colossal' action of God.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: While a rhetorical analysis would focus on the Auden/Eliot quotes as 'pathos', Greimas shows they function as actantial descriptors of the 'Opponent'.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis explains Psalm 115; Greimas shows how the sermon uses the Psalm to switch the Subject from 'Apostles' to 'God'.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Reveals that the 'acting' metaphor is actually a modal lesson in 'Savoir-faire' (knowing how to be a Subject by becoming a Receiver).

appendices.notities: The sermon is a direct application of Rutledge's own homiletical theory.
